text: Edward, My Son is a 1949 British American drama movie directed by George Cukor and was based on the 1947 play of the same name by Noel Langley and Robert Morley. It stars Spencer Tracy, Deborah Kerr (in her Oscar nominated role), Ian Hunter, Mervyn Johns, Leueen McGrath, Felix Aylmer, Walter Fitzgerald and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor
title: Edward, My Son
